itineraries.title: Tokyo Adventure
itineraries.highlights: Explore the vibrant streets of Shibuya, visit the historic Senso-ji Temple, and experience the famous Tsukiji Fish Market. Don't miss the stunning views from Tokyo Skytree and the peaceful Meiji Shrine.

itineraries.title: Paris Cultural Experience
itineraries.highlights: Visit the Louvre Museum, climb the Eiffel Tower, stroll along the Champs-Élysées, and explore the charming Montmartre district. Experience authentic French cuisine and wine tasting.

itineraries.title: Bali Beach Paradise
itineraries.highlights: Relax on pristine beaches, visit ancient temples, experience traditional Balinese culture, and enjoy world-class surfing spots. Don't miss the stunning rice terraces and sacred monkey forest.

itineraries.title: Swiss Alps Adventure
itineraries.highlights: Ski on world-class slopes, hike scenic mountain trails, and enjoy breathtaking views of the Matterhorn. Experience traditional Swiss culture and cuisine in charming alpine villages.

itineraries.title: New York City Explorer
itineraries.highlights: Visit iconic landmarks like Times Square and Central Park, explore world-class museums, and enjoy Broadway shows. Experience diverse neighborhoods and international cuisine.

itineraries.title: Safari Adventure in Kenya
itineraries.highlights: Experience thrilling wildlife safaris in the Maasai Mara, visit local tribes, and witness the Great Migration. Stay in luxury lodges and enjoy authentic African cuisine.

itineraries.title: Italian Food Tour
itineraries.highlights: Learn authentic Italian cooking, visit local markets, and enjoy wine tasting in Chianti. Explore historic cities and experience the rich culinary heritage of Tuscany.

itineraries.title: Great Barrier Reef Explorer
itineraries.highlights: Snorkel in the world's largest coral reef system, explore the Daintree Rainforest, and experience Aboriginal culture. Enjoy beautiful beaches and unique wildlife encounters.

itineraries.title: Historical Rome Tour
itineraries.highlights: Visit the Colosseum, Roman Forum, and Vatican City. Explore ancient ruins and experience the rich history of the Roman Empire. Enjoy authentic Italian cuisine and culture.

itineraries.title: Thailand Food Adventure
itineraries.highlights: Explore vibrant street food markets, learn Thai cooking, and visit floating markets. Experience the perfect blend of traditional and modern Thai cuisine.

itineraries.title: Norwegian Fjords Cruise
itineraries.highlights: Cruise through stunning fjords, witness the Northern Lights, and explore charming coastal towns. Experience Norwegian culture and enjoy fresh seafood.

itineraries.title: Moroccan Desert Safari
itineraries.highlights: Camp in the Sahara Desert, ride camels, and visit traditional Berber villages. Experience vibrant markets and authentic Moroccan cuisine.

itineraries.title: Greek Island Hopping
itineraries.highlights: Visit stunning islands, enjoy beautiful beaches, and explore ancient ruins. Experience Greek culture and enjoy Mediterranean cuisine.

itineraries.title: Vietnam Cultural Tour
itineraries.highlights: Explore ancient temples, visit traditional villages, and experience local markets. Enjoy authentic Vietnamese cuisine and learn about rich cultural heritage.

itineraries.title: Canadian Rockies Adventure
itineraries.highlights: Hike in stunning national parks, spot wildlife, and enjoy outdoor activities. Experience Canadian hospitality and enjoy local cuisine.

itineraries.title: Spanish Tapas Tour
itineraries.highlights: Experience authentic tapas culture, visit local markets, and learn Spanish cooking. Explore historic cities and enjoy flamenco shows.

itineraries.title: Egyptian Pyramids Tour
itineraries.highlights: Visit the Great Pyramids, explore ancient temples, and cruise the Nile. Experience Egyptian culture and enjoy traditional cuisine.

itineraries.title: Brazilian Carnival Experience
itineraries.highlights: Experience the world's biggest carnival, visit famous beaches, and enjoy samba shows. Explore vibrant neighborhoods and enjoy Brazilian cuisine.

itineraries.title: New Zealand Nature Tour
itineraries.highlights: Explore stunning landscapes, visit national parks, and enjoy outdoor adventures. Experience Maori culture and enjoy local cuisine.

itineraries.title: Dubai Luxury Experience
itineraries.highlights: Visit the Burj Khalifa, shop in luxury malls, and experience desert safaris. Enjoy world-class dining and entertainment.
